net.sf.sprockets.content

Class LocalCursorLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Loader<D>
      • android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<D>
        • net.sf.sprockets.content.CursorWrapperLoader<EasyCursor>
          • net.sf.sprockets.content.EasyCursorLoader
            • net.sf.sprockets.content.LocalCursorLoader

  • public abstract class LocalCursorLoader
extends EasyCursorLoader
    Provides the current location to implementations before performing the cursor query.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.Loader

        Loader.ForceLoadContentObserver, Loader.OnLoadCanceledListener<D>, Loader.OnLoadCompleteListener<D>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalCursorLoader(Context context)
      By default, the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location will be provided to onLocation(Location).
      LocalCursorLoader(Context context, Content.Query q)
      By default, the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location will be provided to onLocation(Location).
      LocalCursorLoader(Context context, Uri uri, String[] projection, String selection, String[] selectionArgs, String sortOrder)
      By default, the best most recent location or, if none are available, the current coarse location will be provided to onLocation(Location).
